articles.title: Congratulations to Cambodian King
articles.content:
Congratulations to Cambodian King
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni on the occasion of his 62nd birthday.
					 The message wished the king good health and happiness and greater success in his noble work for developing the country and promoting the people's wellbeing.
					
					 It expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Cambodia with a long history and tradition would grow stronger.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Accused of Suppressing Chongryon and Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Accused of Suppressing Chongryon and Koreans in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The joint investigation headquarters of Japan made up of police headquarters of Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures hurled a lot of policemen into the operation to arrest 3 officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) including the manager of the Korean Speciality Sales Company and search their houses Tuesday on charges of the "Oriental Co. Ltd.'s violation of the law on foreign exchange."
					 The Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea released a statement on Wednesday, denouncing it as a serious provocation against the DPRK and an unpardonable challenge to the aspiration and desire of all Koreans and other progressive people in the world.
					
					 Neither Chongryon nor its arrested officials have anything to do with the Oriental Co. Ltd, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 In less than five minutes after the arrest media of Japan simultaneously reported the news about it under the same title "Second son of chairman of Chongryon arrested." This clearly shows what purpose the search and arrest sought.
					
					 The operation was chiefly aimed to justify the extension of "separate sanctions" against the DPRK by branding Chongryon, a dignified overseas Koreans' organization of the DPRK, as an "illegal organization" in the run-up to the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon and further stirring up the atmosphere against the DPRK and Chongryon throughout the Japanese society and thus realize the militarist wild ambition.
					
					 Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan are under the protection of the DPRK and any act of infringing upon their rights precisely means a serious encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 As Japan is wantonly violating the basic spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and agreed points to persistently disturb Chongryon officials and their families, the DPRK cannot but take countermeasures and the Japanese authorities will be held wholly accountable for all the ensuing consequences affecting the relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Urged to Stop at Once Their Crackdown on Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Urged to Stop at Once Their Crackdown on Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK-Japan Exchange Association gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Wednesday as regards the Japanese police authorities' search for the houses of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and unreasonable arrest of them:
					 On Tuesday the Japanese police authorities searched the houses of three Chongryon officials by groundlessly charging them with violation of the "law on foreign exchange" and unreasonably arrested them.
					
					 Such tyrannical action deliberately taken on the threshold of the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon is touching off towering resentment of all the Koreans as Japan has not made any slightest reparation for the crimes committed against the Korean people though seven decades have passed since Japan's defeat in World War II.
					
					 The repeated politically-motivated suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan should never be overlooked as it is a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK-Japan Exchange Association vehemently denounces the recent case as politically-motivated suppression and human rights abuse, prompted by a cynic ploy to do harm to Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop at once the foolish act of unreasonably arresting Korean citizens in Japan and trying to pressurize the DPRK with them as hostage.
					
					 The Japanese authorities will be wholly responsible for the grave consequences to be entailed by the recent action.

articles.title: DPRK-Japan Friendship Association Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Brutal Suppression of Koreans
articles.content:
DPRK-Japan Friendship Association Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Brutal Suppression of Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries let policemen of Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures arrest in broad daylight 3 officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and search their houses on May 12.
					 The DPRK-Japan Friendship Association in a statement Thursday bitterly denounced the Japanese reactionaries' unprecedented inhuman crackdown upon Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The statement said that through this action Japan completely put off its mask as "law-governed state" and "democratic state" and revealed its true colors as a country of brutes and gangsters. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Japanese police authorities claimed that the arrested three Koreans in Japan violated the "law on foreign exchange" by "importing north Korean songi mushrooms" but this claim is nothing but a sheer lie and fabrication without any legal ground.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have staged ceaseless campaigns against Chongryon and Koreans until today with the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon at hand, but never have such campaigns been so vicious, persistent and frantic as now. 
					
					 By revising the U.S.-Japan "defence cooperation guidelines", the Japanese authorities seek to lay a springboard favorable for realizing their ambition to turn Japan into a military giant and, at the same time, it tries to stamp out Chongryon, a full-fledged legitimate overseas citizens organization of the DPRK in Japan, to begin with, as part of its moves to stifle the DPRK, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK 
					
					 With no frantic crackdown on Chongryon and Koreans in Japan on the basis of all sorts of lies and fabrication can the Japanese reactionaries arrest the righteous activities of Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should stop the vicious politically-motivated crackdown and human rights abuses against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and release the illegally detained officials of Chongryon at once.

articles.title: Thai Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Thai Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Thailand led by Deputy Minister Don Pramudwinai flew back home on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Switzerland
articles.content:
DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for Switzerland
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- A DPRK public health delegation headed by Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk left here Thursday to take part in the 68th General Assembly of WHO to be held in Geneva.

articles.title: Russian Diplomats Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
Russian Diplomats Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy staff members visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on Thursday on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Russia's victory in the Great Patriotic War.
					 They paid tribute to the statue of President Kim Il Sung waving back to columns of the military parade celebrating the victory in the war at the square.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid tribute to the officers and men of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					
					 They looked round different halls, being briefed on the fact that the Korean people inflicted upon the Japanese imperialists and liberated the country, true to the leadership of the President.

articles.title: President of Guinea-Bissau Wishes Korean People Success in Their Struggle
articles.content:
President of Guinea-Bissau Wishes Korean People Success in Their Struggle
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador Hong Son Phyo presented his credentials to the president of Guinea-Bissau on May 8.
					 The president said the relations between the two countries are long-standing ones, underlining the need to boost them in various fields in the future.
					
					 The president sincerely wished the Korean people bigger successes in their efforts to defend the sovereignty of the country and realize the cause of Korea's reunification under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Participants in Youth Meeting
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Participants in Youth Meeting
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to the participants in the 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits.
					 The message said that the meeting is a significant one to make a big contribution to powerfully demonstrating the revolutionary and noble mental and moral traits of young Koreans who were educated and trained under the care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and fully preparing all young people to be a reliable scout party of the WPK and a shock brigade in building a thriving nation as required by the new era of Juche revolution.
					
					 It is the consistent policy of the Party shaped and enforced by the President and Kim Jong Il and the best method of education suited to the psychological character of the young people to train excellent people and educate the masses by influence of positive example, the message noted, adding:
					
					 The WPK Central Committee highly praises the participants in the meeting, young frontrunners in noble traits and all other young people across the country for having displayed noble mental and moral traits as befitting the descendants of Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il and performed great feats to go down in the history of the country while taking the lead in the sacred drive for remaining true to the idea and leadership of the Party.
					
					 It is the firm determination and will of the WPK to repose deep trust in the young people and encourage them to enter the gate of a thriving nation before anyone else.
					
					 The message called on all young people to dynamically advance toward the final victory under the unfurled flag of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, true to the plan and intention of the Party.
					
					 It expressed belief that they would glorify forever the undying exploits the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu performed in the history of Juche-based youth movement and fully demonstrate the might of the power of youth.

articles.title: 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits Held
articles.content:
2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits Held
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The 2nd National Meeting of Young Frontrunners in Noble Traits took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday and Thursday.
					 The meeting discussed the tasks and ways for glorifying forever the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by training young people to display noble socialist traits and generalizing the noble traits highly displayed under the guidance of the Party and thus fully preparing them as pace-setters in the era possessed of revolutionary outlook on life.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, young frontrunners in noble traits across the country, young frontrunners in noble traits of the old generation, officials of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and those concerned.
					
					 A congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to the participants in the meeting was read out by Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, made a report.
					
					 He said that the history of the Korean youth movement is the one of great leadership Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in which they trained young people as those strong in idea and morality and the history in which they powerfully led the revolution and construction by giving full play to their mental power.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the Korean young people have grown to be possessors of noble ideological and mental traits, young heroes in the Songun era and excellent ones, he stressed this is a brilliant fruition of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's idea of attaching importance to youth and love for them.
					
					 He called on all young people to glorify their worthwhile youth as a scout party dynamically advancing straight under the leadership of the party on the historic road of accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers evinced their determination to be performers of shining feats and young heroes in the onward general offensive for the final victory by thoroughly carrying out the tasks set forth in the congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 At the venue of the meeting the congratulatory group of the Korean Children's Union recited a poem.
					
					 The meeting fully demonstrated the unshakable faith and will of young vanguard to fulfill their mission and duty as a reliable scout party and a flank unit of the WPK in the drive to fully demonstrate the validity and vitality of the Party's policy of attaching importance to youth and the might of single-minded unity of Songun Korea and glorify the great Kim Jong Un's era.

articles.title: Women's Volleyball Game between DPRK and Vietnam Held
articles.content:
Women's Volleyball Game between DPRK and Vietnam Held
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- A friendly game between the DPRK April 25 Women's Volleyball Team and the Vietnamese State Women's Volleyball Team took place at the Volleyball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street Thursday.
					 Watching the game were officials in the field of sports, sportspersons and staff members of the Vietnamese embassy here.
					
					 In the first game played earlier the DPRK team beat its rival 3:1 and in the second game the DPRK team also defeated its rival 3:2.

articles.title: State Industrial Art Exhibition Closes
articles.content:
State Industrial Art Exhibition Closes
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The State Industrial Art Exhibition closed with due ceremony on Thursday. It opened on April 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 On display at the exhibition were more than 1 300 designs which were completed under the meticulous guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, at least 800 works presented by creators of industrial art, teachers, researchers, students, enthusiasts from across the country and over 80 products.
					
					 It was visited by officials and creators of ministries and national institutions and in the field of the industrial art from across the country, working people, youth and students.
					
					 Relevant certificates, medals and prizes were awarded to creators who were highly appreciated at the exhibition.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, made a closing speech.

articles.title: New Labor Regulations to Be Invariably Enforced in KIZ
articles.content:
New Labor Regulations to Be Invariably Enforced in KIZ
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK revised the labor regulations and promulgated them in November last year in conformity with the development of industrial zones, taking into full consideration the situation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ), realities in international special zones, etc.
					 Pursuant to them, the DPRK notified the south side that a new wage pattern would be applied from March this year so that businesses of the south side might be fully ready for the new regulations.
					
					 In consideration of conditions of businessmen, the DPRK took such generous measure as extending the date of wage payment for March a week.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities, far from thanking the DPRK for its good faith and generosity, pulled up it over its legitimate enforcement of legislation, terming it "unilateral one violating the north-south agreement." Not content with this, they are threatening and blackmailing the businesses to prevent them from paying the wages for March while making investigations into them.
					
					 A spokesman for the General Bureau for Central Guidance to the Development of the Special Zone declared in a statement on Wednesday the KIZ is an economic special zone being operated together with businessmen of the south side and that the south Korean authorities, therefore, have neither reason nor pretext to interfere in it.
					
					 We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the south Korean authorities are set to apply a "deposit" system to wage payment from April, something rare to be found in economic zones of other countries, in a crafty bid to use the businessmen for wantonly violating the laws and regulations in the KIZ and openly encroaching upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 Businessmen of the south side should keep vigilance against this move so that they may not be scapegoats for the authorities' plot to wantonly violate the DPRK's laws and regulations in the KIZ, an encroachment upon its sovereignty.
					
					 They should seriously think once again over what they would gain by yielding to the pressure of the authorities to turn the KIZ into the one of factories without workers where business autonomy is seriously violated.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the issue of enforcing the new labor regulations is not an issue to be discussed at the talks between authorities as it is an issue concerning the DPRK's legitimate enforcement of legislation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once putting the brake and pressure upon the businesses' autonomous management in the KIZ and deliberately laying an obstacle in the way of the operation of the KIZ and ensure their free management.
					
					 Not only the south Korean authorities but also the commission responsible for the management of the KIZ are to blame for the situation prevailing in the zone.
					
					 If the management commission continues working hard to infringe upon the inviolable sovereignty of the DPRK, making the KIZ a political bargaining chip for someone under the manipulation of the south Korean authorities, departing from its mission, the DPRK will call it into question for the ensuing serious consequences and it would not be possible for the DPRK to entrust the management of the KIZ to the commission.
					
					 The KIZ is, in actuality, a zone for north-south economic cooperation, not a theater for confrontation between the authorities of the north and the south.
					
					 The DPRK will keep enforcing the new labor regulations for the normal development of the KIZ in the future.

articles.title: Briefing on Tourist Zone to Be Given in DPRK
articles.content:
Briefing on Tourist Zone to Be Given in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- A briefing on investment in the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang international tourist zone will be given at Mt. Kumgang Resort on May 27.
					 In this regard, O Ung Gil, general manager of the Wonsan Area Development Corporation, told KCNA:
					
					 The briefing will focus on the advantages of developing the Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang international tourist zone, legal guarantee for investment and the master plan of its development.
					
					 The participants will go sightseeing in the areas of Sea Kumgang, Kuryong Pool and Lagoon Samil during their 6 day-long sojourn from May 25.
					
					 Business consultations are also expected to be held in the period.

articles.title: Pukchong County Changes Appearance
articles.content:
Pukchong County Changes Appearance
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- Pukchong County in South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK, a famous fruit-producing base, has undergone radical changes as a thriving orchard.
					 In recent four years the county created more than one thousand hectares of orchard and successfully finished making 8 000 meters of wire net fences.
					
					 Several hundred hectares of land were rezoned and carpeted with humus soil and 2 300 kilometers of trench-formed pits dug with the production of over ten million tons of organic fertilizer.
					
					 Tens of kilometers of road and waterway were built in the orchard and dwarf apple and other fruit trees planted in more than one thousand hectares of area.
					
					 High-yield variety of fruit saplings are being produced in 100-odd hectares of land.
					
					 The construction of the Pukchong Apple Institute drew to near completion and 30 hectares of fruit experimental plot appeared in the county.
					
					 A signal progress has been made in the work to build fruit storehouse with large capacity and stockbreeding base.

articles.title: Deep Attention Paid to Green Architecture in DPRK
articles.content:
Deep Attention Paid to Green Architecture in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is paying big efforts to encouraging green architecture.
					 Ahead of all, a research work has been pushed forward to introduce renewable energy in building structures.
					
					 The Paektusan Architectural Institute and the Natural Energy Institute under the State Academy of Sciences remodeled solar collector to raise its efficiency and Kim Chaek University of Technology developed various kinds of small wind-driven generators.
					
					 The Ryongsong Machine Complex, in collaboration with the Branch Academy of Railway Science under the State Academy of Sciences, developed a geothermal pump, which can generate rated power, not affected by variation of voltage and frequency.
					
					 The Architectural Engineering Branch under the State Academy of Sciences has developed green roofing materials as well as intellectual components for automatic control of facilities necessary for keeping buildings warm.
					
					 Such achievements have been also made by the Pyongyang City Planning and Designing Institute and the Pyongyang University of Architecture.
					
					 A national scientific and technology presentation and exhibition for green architecture held in March this year marked an important occasion in architectural development of the country.

articles.title: TV Drama "Bulletproof Wall" Released
articles.content:
TV Drama "Bulletproof Wall" Released
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- TV drama "Bulletproof Wall" produced by the TV Drama Studio of the DPRK is gaining popularity in the country.
					 The drama has its setting in the moments of launching the final attack to liberate Korea from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 It shows well the tradition of devotedly defending the leader created by the anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs as well as the noble mental spirit of patriots through successful creation of individual character, sequential process of stimulating emotions and fresh dramatic arrangement.

articles.title: Sulfur Mud Good for Fodder Additives
articles.content:
Sulfur Mud Good for Fodder Additives
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the DPRK have recently confirmed that sulfur mud is good for fodder additives.
					 When interviewed by KCNA, Dr. Kim Ryong Gil of the Life Science Faculty of Kim Il Sung University said:
					
					 Sulfur mud, abundant in the seaside thermal regions of our country, contains vitamins, antibiotics, enzymes, hormone and other active organic matters.
					
					 It has rich macroelements, microelements, selenium, iodine, iron and some rare-earth elements, which are very effective for growth stimulant.
					
					 The effect of sulfur mud as fodder additives has already been proved through its application in various stockbreeding bases.

articles.title: Leading Papers Blast Japanese Reactionaries' Brutal Suppression of Koreans
articles.content:
Leading Papers Blast Japanese Reactionaries' Brutal Suppression of Koreans
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- On the early morning of May 12 the Japanese police stormed houses of three Koreans including the second son of the chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) to arrest them and search their houses.
					 Such action was taken by them on the same charge as what they invented for searching the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee in March.
					
					 The police claim that the three Koreans in Japan were involved in the "illegal import of north Korean songi mushrooms" as they allegedly instructed the business.
					
					 These guiltless Koreans were taken to the police station in handcuffs in their families' presence. Afterwards, the police searched their houses over half a day.
					
					 Papers here Thursday in commentaries terms it fascist gangsterism which could be committed only by the barbarians in the modern times unaware of rule of law and bereft of humanity.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun observes that the above-said action once again brought to light mean nature and brutality peculiar to Japan.
					
					 In less than five minutes after the arrest was made, Japanese media all at once spotlighted the story titled "Second son of Chongryon chairman arrested" that "he is the prime suspect in the case."
					
					 It is crystal clear to all that the Japanese reactionaries are working hard to build up the public opinion that Koreans in Japan are committing all sorts of illegal acts at the instructions of the chairman and the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon.
					
					 The recent reckless action of the Japanese reactionaries was prompted by a very sinister political motive as it was a product of Japan's vicious hostile policy towards the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 It was another unpardonable provocation to the dignified DPRK and Chongryon and an illegal and fascist action and the worst human right abuse as it wantonly trampled down upon the dignity and human rights of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Minju Joson observes that the Japanese government should be entirely responsible for the consequences to be entailed by the unprecedented fascist action.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Group's Pro-U.S., Pro-Japanese Acts
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korean Group's Pro-U.S., Pro-Japanese Acts
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea let loose a spate of such outbursts as "the revised U.S.-Japan defence cooperation guidelines meet the requirements for respect for sovereignty" of south Korea and "there was trace of reflecting the stand of south Korea." Not content with this, the group is going so ridiculous as to zealously patronize its masters while talking about "defensive" and "political nature." 
					 Minju Joson Thursday in a commentary denounces the south Korean puppet group as the horde of traitors obsessed with pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese acts and confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 The Korean nation can never be free from disasters as long as such traitors and confrontation maniacs are allowed to perpetrate acts of treachery backed by outside forces bringing all Koreans the danger of a nuclear war, the commentary says, adding: 
					
					 It is the way of defending the sovereignty of the nation, opposing a war, preserving peace and bringing earlier independent reunification to wage a dynamic struggle against Park Geun Hye. 
					
					 Those who are fond of playing with fire are bound to perish in the flames.
					
					 If the Park group persists in its reckless acts, pursuant to the policy of the U.S. and the Japanese reactionaries for aggression, it is bound to meet a miserable end.
					
					 The puppet group's sycophantic and treacherous acts will only precipitate its own self-destruction.

articles.title: More Evidence Proving Fraudulent Election Discovered in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Evidence Proving Fraudulent Election Discovered in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean weekly magazine News Journal on May 10 disclosed the fact that Park Geun Hye's forces secretly set up an election office and used it in the period of the puppet presidential election.
					 According to it, the "Saenuri Party" secretly operated an election measure committee in addition to the similar committee it officially organized to ensure Park's win in the 2012 "presidential" election.
					
					 The disclosure of more evidence proving the election rigging by the puppet group once again clearly showed that Park was elected as a result of swindles and fabrications.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Works Introduced by British Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Works Introduced by British Body
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's works "On the Three Principles of National Reunification", "The Ten-Point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" and "The Inaugural Declaration of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" were posted on the website of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on May 1.
					 The first work, published on May 3 and Nov. 3, Juche 61 (1972), clarifies the three principles of Korea's reunification -- independence, great national unity and peaceful reunification. It also deals with the idea of realizing collaboration between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 The second work, published on May 5, 1936, indicates the political, economic, cultural and military tasks to be fulfilled in the phase of anti-imperialist, anti-feudal democratic revolution.
					
					 The third work published on the same day deals with the reason why the Korean people could not have attained their purpose in their past struggle for national independence and liberation and indicates the tasks for all Koreans to wage a struggle on the basis of the ten-point programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland.

articles.title: British Website Introduces Workers Hostel of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill
articles.content:
British Website Introduces Workers Hostel of Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill
 Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website an article introducing the workers hostel of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill on May 4.
					 Referring to the warm loving care and benevolence shown by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the textile mill, the article said:
					
					 Their warm love is being given steady continuity by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Marshal, when visiting the mill in October 2013, said he would make sure in a responsible manner that a hostel for its workers was built at the best level as desired by Kim Jong Il. The Marshal chose its site and settled everything necessary for the construction.
					
					 Upon being told about the completion of its construction in April, 2014, he visited it. Going round its various places, he expressed great satisfaction, saying more behests of the President and Kim Jong Il have been implemented and he could keep the promise made to its workers.
					
					 Proposing arranging a grand banquet for workers at the new hostel on May Day, he instructed officials accompanying him to congratulate them on his behalf.
					
					 The hostel is, indeed, a palace of love for workers, a house of happiness and a warm cradle built thanks to Kim Jong Un who successfully brings what the President and Kim Jong Il wished into realities generation after generation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita cumpleanos de rey camboyano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita cumpleanos de rey camboyano
Pyongyang, 14 de mayo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 14 un mensaje de felicitacion al rey de Cambodia, Norodom Sihamoni, con motivo del 62o aniversario de su cumpleanos.
					En su misiva el remitente deseo al destinatario buena salud, felicidad y mayores exitos en su noble trabajo para el desarrollo del pais y el fomento de bienestar del pueblo.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y Cambodia con larga historia y tradiciones.

articles.title: CCACU denuncia represion de autoridades japonesas contra Chongryon y coreanos en Japon
articles.content:
CCACU denuncia represion de autoridades japonesas contra Chongryon y coreanos en Japon
						
Pyongyang, 14 de mayo (ACNC) -- El dia 12, el grupo de investigacion conjunta compuesto por las estaciones policiales de la prefectura de Kyoto y los departamentos de Kanagawa, Yamakuchi y Shimane movilizo a muchos policias para arrestar a 3 funcionarios de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos en Japon), inclusive el director de la compania de venta de productos especiales de Corea, y registrar por la fuerza las casas de los detenidos bajo el pretexto de la supuesta "violacion de la ley de divisas por parte de la Compania Limitada del Oriente".
					En su declaracion publicada la vispera, el Comite Coreano de Ayuda a los Compatriotas en Ultramar condena ese incidente como grave provocacion contra la RPDC y el desafio intolerable a la aspiracion y al deseo de la nacion coreana y la humanidad progresista del mundo, y prosigue:
					
					La Chongryon y los funcionarios arrestados por la policia japonesa no tienen nada que ver con el caso de la Compania Limitada del Oriente. 
					
					En menos de 5 minutos desde el arresto, los medios japoneses se hicieron eco de esa noticia bajo el mismo titulo de "Arrestado el segundo hijo del presidente de la Chongryon", lo cual revelo cual objetivo persigue ese complot politico.
					
					Tal atrocidad tiene la meta principal de inculcar mas en la sociedad japonesa el ambiente anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon al estigmatizar esta organizacion, que celebrara pronto el 60o aniversario de su fundacion, como "entidad ilegal y violadora de ley". Asi quieren justificar el aplazamiento de las "medidas de sancion independiente" a la RPDC y realizar su ambicion militarista.
					
					Los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los coreanos en el pais isla son los ciudadanos en ultramar protegidos por la RPDC y los atentados contra ellos devienen grave violacion de la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Ya que Japon viola flagrantemente el espiritu principal y los articulos acordados de la Declaracion Corea-Japon de Pyongyang y acosa persistentemente a los funcionarios de la Chongryon y sus familiares, la RPDC se vera obligada a tomar las contramedidas correspondientes. 
					
					Las autoridades japonesas se responsabilizaran de todas las consecuencias que se produzcan en las relaciones de ambos paises.

articles.title: Asociacion de Intercambio Corea-Japon denuncia represion fascista anti-Chongryon de autoridades japonesas
articles.content:
Asociacion de Intercambio Corea-Japon denuncia represion fascista anti-Chongryon de autoridades japonesas
Pyongyang, 14 de mayo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que las autoridades policiacas de Japon cometieron el acto fascista de registrar por la fuerza las casas de los funcionarios coreanos residente en su pais y arrestarlos injustamente, el portavoz de la Asociacion de Intercambio Corea-Japon dio la vispera a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					El 12 de mayo, relacionando coercitivamente con la "sospecha de violacion de la ley de divisas", las autoridades policiacas japonesas volvieron a registrar los domicilios de 3 funcionarios coreanos residentes en Japon y los arrestaron injustamente.
					
					Se monta ahora en colera todo el pueblo coreano al informarse de esa accion fascista cometida en visperas del 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Chongryon.
					
					Japon no ha indemnizado todavia sus crimenes cometidos ante el pueblo coreano a pesar de que pasaron 70 anos desde su derrota en la segunda guerra mundial.
					
					La repetida represion politica contra la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon no debe ser tolerada jamas porque constituye una flagrante violacion de la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					Nuestra asociacion denuncia categoricamente el presente incidente calificandolo de una represion politica e inhumanitario acto violador de DDHH que partieron de la malsana intencion de calumniar a la Chongryon.
					
					Las autoridades japoneses deben parar ahora mismo el arresto injusto de los ciudadanos coreanos en ultramar y dejar su necio intento de presionar a la RPDC tomando como rehenes a los coreanos residentes en su pais.
					
					Ellas seran totalmente responsables de las graves consecuencias que emanen del presente acto fascista.

articles.title: Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Japon denuncia represion politica anti-Chongryon
articles.content:
Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Japon denuncia represion politica anti-Chongryon
						
Pyongyang, 14 de mayo (ACNC) -- El dia 12, los reaccionarios japoneses movilizaron los gangsteres policiacos de la prefectura de Kyoto y los departamentos de Kanagawa, Yamakuchi y Shimane, arrestaron a plena luz a los 3 funcionarios de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos en Japon) y registraron a fuerza las casas de los detenidos.
					En una declaracion fechada 14, la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Japon denuncio rotundamente la represion inhumana sin precedente de los reaccionarios japoneses contra la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en el suelo japones.
					
					A traves del presente caso, el pais isla demostro su verdadero aspecto del pais barbaro y el estado gangsteril, quitando la mascara del "estado constitucional" y "estado democratico", adelanta el documento y prosigue:
					
					Las autoridades policiacas de Japon dicen que los funcionarios detenidos estan vinculados con la "violacion de la ley de divisas" al "importar a Japon los hongos de pino hechos en la RPDC". Pero esto no pasa de ser una mentira y una invencion sin fundamento legal.
					
					Desde los primeros dias de la fundacion de la Chongryon hasta la fecha, los reaccionarios japoneses no cesaron las maniobras contra la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon, que se tornan ahora mas aviesas y freneticas.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas intentan preparar el trampolin favorable a la realizacion de la ambicion de convertir a su pais en una potencia militar con la enmienda de la "guia de cooperacion de defensa EE.UU.-Japon", por una parte y por la otra, tratan de exterminar la Chongryon, entidad de los ciudadanos ultramarinos de la RPDC en Japon, sumandose a la politica hostil de EE.UU. anti-RPDC.
					
					Aunque los reaccionarios japoneses estan enloquecidos por la represion contra la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon, valiendose de las mentiras e invenciones, no pueden detener las justas actividades de la Chongryon.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben dejar la represion politica anti-Chongryon y la violacion de DDHH de los coreanos residentes en Japon y excarcelar de inmediato a los detenidos.

articles.title: CC de PTC envia mensaje de felicitacion a participantes en II conferencia nacional de vanguardias jovenes
articles.content:
CC de PTC envia mensaje de felicitacion a participantes en II conferencia nacional de vanguardias jovenes
Pyongyang, 14 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 13 un mensaje de felicitacion a los participantes en la II conferencia nacional de los vanguardias jovenes en conductas loables.
					El mensaje senala que el presente conclave manifestara los nobles y revolucionarios rasgos espirituales y morales de los jovenes coreanos educados en el regazo de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu y contribuira a preparar a todos los jovenes como patrullas del partido y brigada de la construccion de un Estado prospero de acuerdo con las demandas de la nueva era de la revolucion jucheana. 
					
					Formar a las personas con noble virtud y educar a las masas con ejemplos positivos es la invariable politica del partido creada y materializada por los grandes lideres y el ventajoso metodo de educacion conveniente a las peculiaridades psicologicas de la juventud, afirma.
					
					Prosigue que el Comite Central del PTC aprecia los relevantes meritos que dejaron en la historia de la patria los participantes en el conclave, los vanguardias jovenes en conductas loables y todos los jovenes del pais poniendo de pleno manifiesto los nobles rasgos espirituales y morales y apoyando al frente la idea y la direccion del partido como descendientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung, soldados y discipulos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El PTC confia en los jovenes y les deposita la esperanza de abrir al frente las puertas de un Estado prospero, enfatiza y llama a todos los jovenes a marchar a pasos firmes hacia la victoria final enarbolando la bandera de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung en acato al proposito del partido.
					
					Manifiesta la esperanza de que los jovenes coreanos glorifiquen generacion tras generacion las imborrables hazanas de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu realizadas por el movimiento juvenil coreano y exaltaran plenamente el poderio de la potencia de la juventud.

articles.title: Tiene lugar II Conferencia Nacional de Vanguardias Jovenes en Conductas Loables
articles.content:
Tiene lugar II Conferencia Nacional de Vanguardias Jovenes en Conductas Loables
						
Pyongyang, 14 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 13 y 14 en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril la II Conferencia Nacional de los Vanguardias Jovenes en Conductas Loables.
					El foro discutio las tareas y remedios para glorificar generacion tras generacion las imborrables proezas de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu quienes formaron a los jovenes como creadores de los bellos rasgos socialistas y generalizar la noble virtud manifestada bajo la orientacion del partido y preparar a los jovenes como precursores de la epoca con la concepcion revolucionaria de la vida.
					
					Asistieron Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, las vanguardias juveniles en conductas loables de todo el pais, las otras de generacion anterior, los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud Socialista y los interesados.
					
					En la ocasion, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, transmitio el mensaje de felicitacion del CC del PTC a los participantes en la II Conferencia Nacional de los Vanguardias Jovenes en Conductas Loables. 
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, presento el informe.
					
					El orador dijo que la historia del movimiento juvenil coreano es la de gran direccion de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu que formaron a los jovenes como fuertes en la ideologia y la moralidad y condujeron con dinamismo la revolucion y la construccion poniendo de pleno manifiesto la fuerza espiritual de los jovenes. 
					
					Refirio que los jovenes coreanos crecen como encarnadores de nobles rasgos ideologicos y espirituales y heroes de la era del Songun y enfatizo que esto es el brillante resultado de la politica de los grandes hombres de dar importancia a la juventud. 
					
					Llamo a todos los jovenes a marchar a pasos firmes por la unica senda indicada por el partido en la marcha historica para el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Songun. 
					
					Luego, hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores manifestaron las decisiones de materializar cabalmente las tareas indicadas en el mensaje de felicitacion del Comite Central del PTC para hacerse creadores de meritos y heroes en la ofensiva general de hoy por la victoria final. 
					
					Acto seguido, el grupo de felicitacion de la Union de Ninos de Corea entro en el lugar de la conferencia y recito la poesia de felicitacion. 
					
					El conclave demostro claramente la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de vanguardias juveniles de manifestar la justeza y la vitalidad de la politica del partido de dar importancia a la juventud y el poderio de la unidad monolitica de la Corea del Songun y cumplir satisfactoriamente la mision y deber de la fidedigna patrulla y destacamento de reserva del partido en la lucha por hacer brillar la era de Kim Jong Un.
